General.Description: DigitalCash (DASH) uses a new string hashing algorithm, with many new scientific hash algorithms for proof of work. DASH aims to be the first privacy-encrypted currency with encrypted transactions and anonymous block transactions, this feature is called PrivateSend and can be found on the official Dashcore wallet. PrivateSend blends your DASH coins with other users who are also using this feature at the time, making your transactions impossible to find. Furthermore, users can also earn DigitalCash rewards by storing a master button to help maintain Blockchain. One must have at least 1000 DASH to store Dash master button, and this collateral is needed to avoid 51% attacks on the network.
General.Features: DASH includes many powerful features: Untraceable payments; Unlinkable transactions; Double-spending proof; Blockchain analysis resistance; Egalitarian proof of work; Adaptive limits.
General.Technology: DASH is created by new technologies. One of them is POW mechanism. This is a voting system for users. Also, Some technology is integrated as Difficulty retargets each block; Block reward decreases each block according to the formula: BaseReward = (MSupply - A)/218, where MSupply = (264 - 1) atomic units and 'A' is the amount of already created coins.
General.Sponsor: Sponsored by the blockchain on a monthly basis to develop Dash's core technology.
